meanings.definition: A substance used to sweeten food or drink.
meanings.sent1: I added a sweetener to my tea to make it taste better.
meanings.sent2: The sugar substitute is a popular sweetener for coffee.
meanings.sent3: The sweetener made the bitter medicine easier to swallow.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a sweetener to his day, brightening everything around.
meanings.sent5: The sweetener enhanced the flavor of the dessert, making it irresistible.

meanings.definition: Something that makes a deal or situation more attractive or agreeable.
meanings.sent1: The discount was a sweetener that sealed the deal.
meanings.sent2: Including free shipping was a great sweetener for online shoppers.
meanings.sent3: The extra vacation day was a sweetener for working overtime.
meanings.sent4: His offer to help with the project was a sweetener to their partnership.
meanings.sent5: The promise of a bonus acted as a sweetener to motivate the team.
